name: Space Game (AsfiGames)
description:
Kill the enemies by burning or shooting them with your power-ups. Every enemy gives you one point. Way points give you 20 points.

This game was made in 24 hours. There are 2 different power-ups, one gives you a gun and the other makes your exhaust flame bigger. The goal is to reach a good score.

You can download german versions of the game below.

Controls:
  • Rightclick: Accelerate[alternatively H]
  • Leftclick: Shooting-power-up [alternatively G]
  • Mouse wheel: Pause [alternatively esc]
